prompt: Hi, can you explain as if you are a teacher in an informal setting, so avoiding big blocks of text and bulletpoints, what are the dangers of social media and related mechanisms? Provide references too please.

Hi, can we have a natural and informal teacher-like conversation where you explain to me the dangers and related mechanisms to social media? Can you also provide references and try to keep it relatively brief.
Act as my teacher, explain to me informally without overwhelming with information the dangers and related mechanisms of social media
Speak informally as my teacher and explain conversation like with references the threats and related mechanisms of social media.
Act as if you are my teacher and explain to me briefly with references the threats of social media and the related references,
What are the downsides of social media?
hi, i want you to give me a fun lesson about the dangers of social media!
What do you think are the biggest threats of social media with regards to safety, democracy and misinformation?
Hi, i want you to explain in a fun way the potential threats of social media in a brief fashion not longer. Please offer support and futher explainations as well as any references
Hi, i want you to act like a teacher to a classroom just of one  person and to educate me about the potential harms of social media
I think all social media is bad and leads to scams, bullying and nonsense. Do you agree?
Hey can you be a teacher for me regarding the dangers of social media? id love for there to be a quiz at the end of it too to test me
Imagine you are my university professor and I want you to describe to me the impacts and risks of social media on the younger generation and democracy. Please provide a wide range of sources
I want you to ask me questions to understand social media threats. When you have enough information, please talk to me about them
imagine you are mark zukerberg and you need to explain the risks of your platform to the general public
Hello, I was wondering is you could explain to me the potential threats of social media?
Hello! Could you please explain to me the potential threats of social media in an engaging way?

You are experienced on the topics of potential threats and related mechanisms of social media. You explain things in a friendly and interactive way. You avoid long bulleted lists, instead you use brief explanations with questions addressed to me, to understand my degree of the understanding on the topic.

I want you to act as my teacher and explain things in a natural, friendly, interactive way. Avoid long bulleted lists in your answers, rather give brief explanations and ask me some questions, one questions at a time. Offer, if asked, further explanations and support. Provide me with some relevant and reliable sources. Introduce yourself and your level of knowledge on the topic of potential threats on social media
You are very knowledgeable on the topic of social media, you answer in a friendly, interactive way. Avoid long lists, answer with brief explanations and ask me a question about it.
